09-13-2007, 10:45 AM Art1979 American city adventurer Location: Findlay, OH 630 posts, read 1,169,431 times Reputation: 281 Quote: Originally Posted by Crew Chief "Lima; it's not your average bean town" Ok, that got a chuckle. I didn't think anyone outside a 50 mile radius knew about that. They even have cookbooks with that emblazoned on the cover.
